duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-quality hair cutting and styling services to clients with a focus on customer satisfaction.
Engage in hair coloring, treatments, and other salon services based on client preferences.
Offer expert advice on hair care and styling products, contributing to salon product sales.
Maintain a clean and organized work environment and comply with salon regulations and hygiene standards.
Develop and maintain positive relationships with clients, providing exceptional customer service and fostering repeat business.
